casebody.data:
LIMELIGHT NETWORKS, INC., petitioner,
v.
AKAMAI TECHNOLOGIES, INC., et al. No. 12-786. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 10, 2014. Case below, 692 F.3d 1301 . Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit granted. Justice ALITO took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
